casebody.data:
Samuel Brown III, Natural Person, and as Joint Tenant Trustee with Right of Survivorship
v.
Commonwealth of Pennsylvania Department of Revenue Bureau of Individual Taxes, Megan Swisher, Daniel P. Meuser42 NO. 66 MAL 2016 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania May 09, 2016 Appeal from the Commonwealth Court.

Reconsideration Denied June 6, 2016.

Disposition: Denied.
